Info.Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Info.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
Info.Actors: Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
Info.Plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 38 wins & 101 nominations.
